description:
Due to a tragic accident, Banri Tada is struck with amnesia, dissolving the memories of his hometown and past. However, after befriending Mitsuo Yanagisawa, he decides to move on and begin a new life at law school in Tokyo. But just as he is beginning to adjust to his college life, the beautiful Kouko Kaga dramatically barges into Banri's life, and their chance meeting marks the beginning of an unforgettable year.

After having a glimpse of college life, Banri learns that he is in a new place and a new world—a place where he can be reborn, to have new friends, fall in love, makes mistakes and grow. And as he begins to discover who he was, the path he has chosen leads him towards a blindingly bright life that he will never want to forget.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

node.description: A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/志茂文彦) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fumihiko_Shimo)

Noted for writing the scripts for Kyoto Animation's anime adaptations of Key visual novels.

Began his career as a production assistant on [Grave of the Fireflies](https://anilist.co/anime/578/), but switched to writing right after.

edges.role: Theme Song Performance (OP1, OP2, ED1, ED2)

node.description:
__Height:__ 155 cm

[Website](http://king-cr.jp/artist/horie/) | [Profile](https://www.vims.co.jp/talent_profile_detail.php?id=8) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/horieyui-blog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/horieyui_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuihorie_official/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yui_Horie) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A0%80%E6%B1%9F%E7%94%B1%E8%A1%A3) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/4000.html) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/YuiHorieJP)

She is a voice actress and singer currently affiliated with vims. She hosts a radio show called "Horie Yui no Tenshi no Tamago" (堀江由衣の天使のたまご "Yui Horie's Angel Eggs") and is the founding member of the singing group, Aice5. She is also a member of the band Kurobara Hozonkai, with the name YUIEL. Her hobbies include shoulder massaging, reading and eating. She has been affectionately nicknamed "Hocchan" (ほっちゃん) by her Japanese fans.

**Non-anime roles:** 
- Faruzan - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Freesia - Memento Mori (VG)
- Miranda - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Maiden - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Wagon - Ressha Sentai ToQger (Tokusatsu)
- Mine Aomori - Blue Archive (VG)
- Cotton Cookie - Cookie Run: Kingdom (VG)
- Surtr - Arknights (VG)
- Ai-chan - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Charlotte Corday - Fate/Grand Order (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/真木太郎)

Tarou Maki is a producer. He graduated from the Department of Law at Waseda University in 1977 and joined Pioneer. In 1997 he founded production studio [Genco](https://anilist.co/studio/79/) and serves today still as its president.
__Suzuki Kazutomo (鈴木一智)__ is a Japanese animation planner.
__Naohiro Tafu__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. He currently works for the company Movic.
__Nobuhiro Osawa__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. Currently President of Egg Firm, formerly affiliated with [Genco](https://www.genco.co.jp/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/gonakanishi)

Gou Nakanishi graduated with a degree from Waseda University's Faculty of Letter's, Arts and Sciences. Starting his career with King Records in 1997, he has been instrumental in developing popular artistes and anime hits such as Sokyuu no Fafner, Inukami and Negima!? He is also the producer of the hit Japanese pop band, angela.
